name: UIS Services
description: Infrastructure services available in the Urbalurba Infrastructure Stack

itemListElement.name: Open WebUI
itemListElement.description: Modern web interface for interacting with local LLMs via Ollama and LiteLLM
itemListElement.abstract: Feature-rich web UI for local AI chat with model management and user authentication.
itemListElement.summary: Open WebUI provides a ChatGPT-like interface for local LLMs. Supports multiple models via Ollama, user management, conversation history, and integrates with Authentik for SSO.

itemListElement.name: Ollama
itemListElement.description: Local LLM inference server supporting various open-source models
itemListElement.abstract: Run large language models locally with easy model management.
itemListElement.summary: Ollama enables running LLMs locally with simple model downloads. Supports Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, and many other models with GPU acceleration.

itemListElement.name: LiteLLM
itemListElement.description: Unified API proxy for multiple LLM providers with load balancing
itemListElement.abstract: OpenAI-compatible API gateway for multiple LLM backends.
itemListElement.summary: LiteLLM provides a unified OpenAI-compatible API for multiple LLM providers. Supports load balancing, fallbacks, cost tracking, and virtual API keys.

itemListElement.name: Authentik
itemListElement.description: Identity provider with SSO, OAuth2/OIDC, and user management
itemListElement.abstract: Enterprise-grade identity provider with flexible authentication flows.
itemListElement.summary: Authentik provides SSO, OAuth2/OIDC provider, LDAP, SAML, and user management. Configured via blueprints for reproducible setup with forward auth for protecting services.

itemListElement.name: PostgreSQL
itemListElement.abstract: Production-ready PostgreSQL with persistent storage.
itemListElement.summary: PostgreSQL is the primary relational database for the stack. Configured with persistent storage, backup support, and pgAdmin for management.

itemListElement.name: MySQL
itemListElement.abstract: MySQL database server with persistent storage.
itemListElement.summary: MySQL provides an alternative SQL database option. Configured with persistent storage and compatible with applications requiring MySQL-specific features.

itemListElement.name: MongoDB
itemListElement.abstract: Flexible document database for JSON-like data.
itemListElement.summary: MongoDB stores data in flexible JSON-like documents. Ideal for applications with evolving schemas and document-centric data models.

itemListElement.name: Qdrant
itemListElement.description: Vector database for AI/ML similarity search
itemListElement.abstract: High-performance vector database for AI applications.
itemListElement.summary: Qdrant is a vector similarity search engine designed for AI applications. Stores embeddings and enables semantic search, recommendations, and RAG applications.

itemListElement.name: Grafana
itemListElement.abstract: Create and share dashboards for metrics, logs, and traces.
itemListElement.summary: Grafana provides rich visualization for Prometheus metrics, Loki logs, and Tempo traces. Pre-configured with datasources and dashboards for the stack.

itemListElement.name: Prometheus
itemListElement.abstract: Pull-based metrics collection with powerful query language.
itemListElement.summary: Prometheus scrapes metrics from services and stores time-series data. Configured with service discovery and alerting rules for the stack.

itemListElement.name: Loki
itemListElement.description: Log aggregation system inspired by Prometheus
itemListElement.abstract: Horizontally scalable log aggregation with label-based indexing.
itemListElement.summary: Loki aggregates logs from all services with efficient label-based indexing. Query logs in Grafana using LogQL alongside metrics.

itemListElement.name: Tempo
itemListElement.abstract: High-scale distributed tracing with minimal dependencies.
itemListElement.summary: Tempo provides distributed tracing storage compatible with Jaeger, Zipkin, and OpenTelemetry. View traces in Grafana correlated with logs and metrics.

itemListElement.name: Redis
itemListElement.description: In-memory data store for caching and messaging
itemListElement.abstract: Fast in-memory key-value store with persistence options.
itemListElement.summary: Redis provides caching, session storage, and pub/sub messaging. Used by multiple services for performance optimization and real-time features.

itemListElement.name: RabbitMQ
itemListElement.description: Message broker for reliable async communication
itemListElement.abstract: Robust message broker supporting multiple messaging protocols.
itemListElement.summary: RabbitMQ enables reliable asynchronous communication between services. Supports AMQP, MQTT, and STOMP protocols with management UI.

itemListElement.name: Elasticsearch
itemListElement.abstract: Powerful search engine with RESTful API.
itemListElement.summary: Elasticsearch provides full-text search, log analysis, and analytics. Supports complex queries, aggregations, and integrates with Kibana for visualization.

itemListElement.name: Apache Spark
itemListElement.description: Distributed computing engine for big data
itemListElement.abstract: Unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing.
itemListElement.summary: Apache Spark provides distributed data processing for batch and streaming workloads. Supports SQL, ML, and graph processing with Scala, Python, and R APIs.

itemListElement.name: JupyterHub
itemListElement.abstract: Collaborative notebook environment for data science teams.
itemListElement.summary: JupyterHub provides multi-user access to Jupyter notebooks. Integrated with Authentik for SSO and configured for collaborative data science workflows.

itemListElement.name: Unity Catalog
itemListElement.abstract: Unified governance for data and AI assets.
itemListElement.summary: Unity Catalog provides centralized governance for tables, volumes, functions, and ML models. Supports access control, lineage tracking, and data discovery.

itemListElement.name: Traefik
itemListElement.description: Cloud-native ingress controller and reverse proxy
itemListElement.abstract: Modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer.
itemListElement.summary: Traefik handles all HTTP routing, TLS termination, and load balancing. Configured with IngressRoutes for flexible routing and middleware for authentication.

itemListElement.name: pgAdmin
itemListElement.abstract: Feature-rich web interface for PostgreSQL management.
itemListElement.summary: pgAdmin provides a web interface for PostgreSQL administration. Query editor, table management, and server monitoring with Authentik SSO integration.

itemListElement.name: RedisInsight
itemListElement.abstract: Visual interface for Redis data and performance.
itemListElement.summary: RedisInsight provides visual Redis management with key browser, CLI, memory analysis, and slow log inspection.

itemListElement.name: Argo CD
itemListElement.abstract: Declarative GitOps CD for Kubernetes applications.
itemListElement.summary: Argo CD automates Kubernetes deployments using Git as source of truth. Monitors repositories and syncs cluster state with desired configuration.

itemListElement.name: NGINX
itemListElement.description: High-performance web server and reverse proxy
itemListElement.abstract: Fast, reliable web server for static content and proxying.
itemListElement.summary: NGINX serves as the default web server for static content and can act as a reverse proxy. Configured for the root domain with default landing pages.

itemListElement.name: Apache Tika
itemListElement.abstract: Extract text and metadata from documents for AI processing.
itemListElement.summary: Apache Tika detects and extracts metadata and text from various file formats. Used by AI services for document processing, RAG pipelines, and content analysis.

itemListElement.name: OpenTelemetry Collector
itemListElement.abstract: Receive, process, and export telemetry data.
itemListElement.summary: OpenTelemetry Collector receives traces, metrics, and logs from applications and exports to backends like Tempo, Prometheus, and Loki. Provides vendor-neutral instrumentation.

itemListElement.name: Gravitee
itemListElement.abstract: Full-lifecycle API management platform.
itemListElement.summary: Gravitee provides API gateway, developer portal, and API management capabilities. Enables API security, rate limiting, analytics, and developer documentation.

itemListElement.name: Tailscale
itemListElement.description: Zero-config VPN for secure network access
itemListElement.abstract: Secure mesh VPN based on WireGuard.
itemListElement.summary: Tailscale creates a secure mesh network for accessing services from anywhere. Provides internal ingress for developer access without exposing services publicly.

itemListElement.name: Cloudflare Tunnel
itemListElement.description: Secure tunnel for exposing services to the internet
itemListElement.abstract: Expose services securely without opening firewall ports.
itemListElement.summary: Cloudflare Tunnel creates outbound-only connections to expose services on custom domains. No need to open firewall ports or configure NAT.
